goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
indicator_name: Inflow of foreign direct investment by country and economic activity
graph_title: Inflow of foreign direct investment by country and economic activity
goal_name: 17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
target_name: 17.3 Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
indicator_name1: 17.3.1.1 Inflow of foreign direct investment by country and economic activity
organization_name: National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Investment Statistics Department)
definitions: Foreign direct investment is a financial and non-financial investment of a foreign investor if his share in the joint capital is at least 10 percent.
rationale_interpretation: The flow of foreign direct investment by investor country.
data_sources: Data collection, processing and calculation are carried out by the National Statistical Committee.
data_collection: The National Statistical Committee records the receipt of foreign direct investment based on data received from respondents in the form of state statistical reporting No. 1-Invest "Investment Report" (annual, quarterly).
quality_assurance: Logical and arithmetic control of the reporting data is carried out; interformal and time control.
data_availability_gaps: Description of the time period for which the data is available (and/or unavailable) Dynamic series have been available since 1995. The data is published in the statistical collection "Investments in the Kyrgyz Republic", posted on the website of NSC "Statistics" / "Investments".
disaggregation: The data is presented at the national level.
international_comparability: The inflow of foreign direct investment is in accordance with the IMF Balance of Payments Manual, sixth edition.
references_documentation: Methodology of indicators on the website of the National Statistical Committee www.stat .kg National SDG Reporting Platform of the Kyrgyz Republic: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan .github.io
